General.Name: Darwin Precisions Corp
General.Description: Darwin Precisions Corporation, together with its subsidiaries, designs, manufactures, assembles, processes, and trades in backlight modules, computer peripherals, and communication equipment in Taiwan, Korea, China, Japan, and internationally. The company offers optoelectronics products, including light guide, backlight module, mini LED backlight, fine metal mask, precision electroforming mask, and injection thin-film circuit/injection printed thin films; and system integration products for mobility, healthcare, retail, and education application. It also designs, manufactures, and sells LCD modules and backlight, LCD TVs, and related components; manufactures and sells automotive products; and manufactures, sells, and trades in precision plastic parts. The company was formerly known as Forhouse Corporation and changed its name to Darwin Precisions Corporation in 2015. Darwin Precisions Corporation was incorporated in 1989 and is headquartered in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 20-1 Guangfu North Road, Hsinchu City, Taiwan, 303036
